verses.verse: Oh give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> upon His name; <S%H8034><s%> Make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> His deeds <S%H5949><s%> among the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to Him, sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Him; Speak <S%H7878><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> His wonders. <S%H6381><s%>
Glory <S%H1984><s%> in His holy <S%H6944><s%> name; <S%H8034><s%> Let the heart <S%H3820><s%> of those who seek <S%H1245><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be glad. <S%H8055><s%>
Seek <S%H1875><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and His strength; <S%H5797><s%> Seek <S%H1245><s%> His face <S%H6440><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> His wonders <S%H4159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He has done, <S%H6213><s%> His marvels, <S%H4159><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> uttered by His mouth, <S%H6310><s%>
O seed <S%H2233><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> His servant, <S%H5650><s%> O sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> His chosen <S%H972><s%> ones! <S%H972><s%>
He is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God; <S%H430><s%> His judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He has remembered <S%H2142><s%> His covenant <S%H1285><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> The word <S%H1697><s%> which He commanded <S%H6680><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations, <S%H1755><s%>
[The covenant] which <S%H834><s%> He made <S%H3772><s%> with Abraham, <S%H85><s%> And His oath <S%H7621><s%> to Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>
Then He confirmed <S%H5975><s%> it to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a statute, <S%H2706><s%> To Israel <S%H3478><s%> as an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%>
Saying, <S%H559><s%> "To you I will give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> As the portion <S%H9112><s%> of your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%>"
When they were only a few <S%H4962><s%> men <S%H4962><s%> in number, <S%H4557><s%> Very few, <S%H4592><s%> and strangers <S%H1481><s%> in it.
And they wandered <S%H1980><s%> about from nation <S%H1471><s%> to nation, <S%H1471><s%> From [one] kingdom <S%H4467><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>
He permitted <S%H5117><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H120><s%> to oppress <S%H6231><s%> them, And He reproved <S%H3198><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> for their sakes: <S%H5921><s%>
"Do not touch <S%H5060><s%> My anointed <S%H4899><s%> ones, <S%H4899><s%> And do <S%H7489><s%> My prophets <S%H5030><s%> no <S%H408><s%> harm. <S%H7489><s%>"
And He called <S%H7121><s%> for a famine <S%H7458><s%> upon the land; <S%H776><s%> He broke <S%H7665><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread. <S%H3899><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> [who] was sold <S%H4376><s%> as a slave. <S%H5650><s%>
They afflicted <S%H6031><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> with fetters, <S%H3525><s%> He himself <S%H5315><s%> was laid <S%H935><s%> in irons; <S%H1270><s%>
Until <S%H5704><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> that his word <S%H1697><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to pass, <S%H935><s%> The word <S%H565><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> tested <S%H6884><s%> him.
The king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and released <S%H5425><s%> him, The ruler <S%H4910><s%> of peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and set <S%H6605><s%> him free. <S%H6605><s%>
He made <S%H7760><s%> him lord <S%H113><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> And ruler <S%H4910><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> his possessions, <S%H7075><s%>
To imprison <S%H631><s%> his princes <S%H8269><s%> at will, <S%H5315><s%> That he might teach <S%H2449><s%> his elders <S%H2205><s%> wisdom. <S%H2449><s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> also came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> Thus Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sojourned <S%H1481><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham. <S%H2526><s%>
And He caused His people <S%H5971><s%> to be very <S%H3966><s%> fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> And made <S%H6105><s%> them stronger <S%H6105><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> their adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>
He turned <S%H2015><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> to hate <S%H8130><s%> His people, <S%H5971><s%> To deal <S%H5230><s%> craftily <S%H5230><s%> with His servants. <S%H5650><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> His servant, <S%H5650><s%> [And] Aaron <S%H175><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> He had chosen. <S%H977><s%>
They performed <S%H7760><s%> His wondrous <S%H226><s%> acts <S%H1697><s%> among them, And miracles <S%H4159><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham. <S%H2526><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> and made <S%H2821><s%> [it] dark; <S%H2821><s%> And they did not rebel <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H854><s%> His words. <S%H1697><s%>
He turned <S%H2015><s%> their waters <S%H4325><s%> into blood, <S%H1818><s%> And caused their fish <S%H1710><s%> to die. <S%H4191><s%>
Their land <S%H776><s%> swarmed <S%H8317><s%> with frogs <S%H6854><s%> [Even] in the chambers <S%H2315><s%> of their kings. <S%H4428><s%>
He spoke, <S%H559><s%> and there came <S%H935><s%> a swarm <S%H6157><s%> of flies <S%H6157><s%> [And] gnats <S%H3654><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their territory. <S%H1366><s%>
He gave <S%H5414><s%> them hail <S%H1259><s%> for rain, <S%H1653><s%> [And] flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in their land. <S%H776><s%>

He struck <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> their vines <S%H1612><s%> also and their fig <S%H8384><s%> trees, <S%H8384><s%> And shattered <S%H7665><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of their territory. <S%H1366><s%>
He spoke, <S%H559><s%> and locusts <S%H697><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> And young <S%H3218><s%> locusts, <S%H3218><s%> even without <S%H369><s%> number, <S%H4557><s%>
And ate <S%H398><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> vegetation <S%H6212><s%> in their land, <S%H776><s%> And ate <S%H398><s%> up the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their ground. <S%H127><s%>

He also struck <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the first-born <S%H7225><s%> in their land, <S%H776><s%> The first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their vigor. <S%H202><s%>
Then He brought <S%H3318><s%> them out with silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold; <S%H2091><s%> And among His tribes <S%H7626><s%> there <S%H369><s%> was not one <S%H369><s%> who stumbled. <S%H3782><s%>
Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was glad <S%H8055><s%> when they departed; <S%H3318><s%> For the dread <S%H6343><s%> of them had fallen <S%H5307><s%> upon them.
He spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> for a covering, <S%H4539><s%> And fire <S%H784><s%> to illumine <S%H215><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>
They asked, <S%H7592><s%> and He brought <S%H935><s%> quail, <S%H7958><s%> And satisfied <S%H7646><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
He opened <S%H6605><s%> the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> flowed <S%H2100><s%> out; It ran <S%H1980><s%> in the dry <S%H6723><s%> places <S%H6723><s%> [like] a river. <S%H5104><s%>
For He remembered <S%H2142><s%> His holy <S%H6944><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> [With] Abraham <S%H85><s%> His servant; <S%H5650><s%>
And He brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> His people <S%H5971><s%> with joy, <S%H8342><s%> His chosen <S%H972><s%> ones <S%H972><s%> with a joyful <S%H7440><s%> shout. <S%H7440><s%>
He gave <S%H5414><s%> them also the lands <S%H776><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> That they might take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of [the fruit of] the peoples' labor, <S%H5999><s%>
So <S%H5668><s%> that they might keep <S%H8104><s%> His statutes, <S%H2706><s%> And observe <S%H5341><s%> His laws, <S%H8451><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
